name: Gluten-Free Donuts
author: Michelle2s
summary: I had so much trouble finding GF donuts that I had to play around in the kitchen to make one myself. The consistency is light, airy, and resembles a yeast donut. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 quart olive oil for frying, or as needed
¼ cup gluten-free all-purpose baking flour
directions: Heat oil in a deep fryer or in a large saucepan to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Beat coconut milk, all-purpose flour, egg, almond flour, coconut flour, honey, and guar gum together in a bowl using a hand blender until batter resembles thick pancake batter
Drop batter by rounded spoonfuls, working in batches, into the hot oil; fry until donuts are dark brown, 3 to 5 minutes
Remove donuts with a slotted spoon
Pour confectioners' sugar into a shallow bowl
Roll donuts in confectioners' sugar until coated
